feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-19T15:46:30.712001Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;OpenLLM</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bentoml/OpenLLM</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T07:45:31.387330Z</updated >; <link href="https://github.com/bentoml/OpenLLM"/>; <author>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fzliu< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bentoml/OpenLLM/main/assets/main-banner.png" style="宽度：220px ; 高度：124px;" />;<br />;用于在生产中运行大型语言模型 (LLM) 的开放平台。轻松微调、服务、部署和监控任何 LLM。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openllm" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36388219" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;数据库健身房 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cidrdb.org/cidr2023/papers/p27-lim.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T14:45:31.387848 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.cidrdb.org/cidr2023/papers/p27-lim.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;greghn</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;研究人员已将机器学习 (ml) 用于 dbms 自动化。健身房的目标应该是比实时更快地执行工作负载，他们写了一篇描述他们方法的论文——更多细节请参见第 3.2 节。他们还展示了可以部署在生产环境中的 db-gyms，以测试他们的能力并提供关于他们表现的反馈。这篇论文基于十个人的工作……<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#database-gyms-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Apple 设备上显示比白色更亮的颜色</stitle>; < id>;https://github.com/dtinth/superwhite</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T10:45:31.388261Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/dtinth/superwhite "/>; <author>; <name>;ash</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ash</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://github-production-user-asset-6210df.s3.amazonaws.com/510678/246795850-d4f667fd-7a06-4375-a357-fa4e4e71d4c6.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：191px； “ />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了 Apple 设备的显示功能，特别是显示比白色更亮的颜色的能力。此功能是通过使用先进技术实现的，并允许在 Apple 设备上呈现更加生动逼真的视觉效果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#display-brighter-than-white-color-on-apple-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36389285" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：Slint - 用 Rust 编写的用于嵌入式和桌面的声明式 UI 工具包</stitle>; <id>;https://slint.dev</id >; <updated>;2023-06-19T09:45:31.388637Z</updated>; <link href="https://slint.dev"/>; <author>; <name>;ogoffart</name>; <uri>;https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ogoffart</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://slint.dev/assets/img/responsive.png" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：143px；" />;<br />;使用实时预览通过快速迭代完成您的 UI 设计。调整所有内容，例如颜色、动画、几何图形或文本，并立即验证更改。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-slint-a-declarative-ui-toolkit-written-in-rust-for-embedded-desktop" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388821" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Vim 中的纯文本日志</stitle>; <id>;https://peppe.rs/posts/plain_text_journaling /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T12:45:31.389002Z</updated>; <link href="https://peppe.rs/posts/plain_text_journaling/"/>; <author>; <name>;gigatexal< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gigatexal</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://u.peppe. rs/SpF.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;我用 {neo,}vim、coreutils 和 dateutils 拼凑了一个日志系统。该系统大致基于 Ryder Caroll 的 Bullet Journal 方法。每个目录中有 12 个文件，一年中的每个月一个，编号如下：我更喜欢每周计划，而不是每天创建任务列表，这是我前几周的内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#plain-text-journaling-in-vim" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36390405" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;我父亲可能已经不在了，但“我们的”收音机仍在播放</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/opinion/story/2023-06- 17/父亲节无线电记忆</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T11:45:31.389366Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.latimes.com/opinion/story/2023 -06-17/fathers-day-radio-memories"/>; <author>; <name>;mirthlessend</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mirthlessend</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/d0b9e9b/2147483647/strip/true/crop/1769x1179+0+516/resize/840x560 !/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2F92%2F60%2F692fbdd441db9113dd024ea9ccd4%2Fbarbara-rose-killen.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度： 147 像素；" />;<br />;这是一台块状的黑色收音机，于 1941 年制造，那年我父亲 12 岁。 1978 年，我 13 岁时从县垃圾填埋场抢走了它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-father-may-be-gone-but-our-radio-is-still -going" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36375271" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;早期微生物的“失落世界”繁盛了十亿年之前</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01847-8</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T10:45:31.389722Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01847-8"/>; <author>; <name>;gumby</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=gumby</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nature.com/naturecareers/getasset/f562f6e7-2d92-4524-8fb5-df79a7fb34d0/" style="宽度：220px；高度：111px；" />;<br />;古代岩石中的类脂肪化合物指向大量以前未知的微生物，这些微生物曾经主宰地球上的复杂生命。古代岩石中的类脂肪化合物指向大量以前未知的微生物，这些微生物曾经主宰地球上的复杂生命。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-lost-world-of-early-microbes-thrived-one-billion-years-ago" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;调试器 Ghidra 类</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra/tree/master/GhidraDocs /GhidraClass/Debugger</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T12:45:31.390074Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra/tree/master/GhidraDocs/GhidraClass/调试器”/>; <author>; <name>;simonpure</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=simonpure</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/136ea4d0618827aeb8721e781fa758ee37dcc6d42679a27c40b28763b35f5371/NationalSecurityAgency/ghidra" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;这是Debugger培训班的课件。它旨在直接在 GitHub 或 GitLab 中查看，但也可以在课堂上呈现以供离线查看。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debugger-ghidra-class" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TypeScript 5.2 的新关键字：'using'</stitle>; <id>;https://www.totaltypescript.com/ typescript-5-2-new-keyword-using</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T09:45:31.390429Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.totaltypescript.com/typescript-5 -2-new-keyword-using"/>; <author>; <name>;Lwrless</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Lwrless</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/total-typescript/image/upload/v1687173860/await-using_lalzrw.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;TypeScript 5.2 将引入一个新的关键字 - 'using' - 当它离开范围时，您可以使用它来处理任何带有 Symbol.dispose 函数的东西。这是基于最近达到第 3 阶段的 TC39 提案，表明它即将进入 JavaScript。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typescript-5-2-s-new-keyword-using" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388894" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我对 Nix 的第一印象</stitle>; <id>;https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T06:45:31.390808Z</updated>; <link href="https://mtlynch.io/notes/nix-first-impressions/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/ae57cc51889fbe1643c1a73bbd2f7e83afe3be70/ aac5f/notes/nix-first-impressions/hashimoto-tweet.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：154px；" />;<br />;Nix是一个根据源文件配置软件环境的工具。它允许您在源代码中定义计算机系统的配置，并使系统进入该状态。 Nix 旨在配置其所在的环境，而 Ansible 旨在通过网络配置系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-first-impressions-of-nix" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36387874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;同时在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an -indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T03:45:31.391171Z</updated>; <link href= “https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years”/>; <作者>; <名称>;plateofsoup</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plateofsoup</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http:// juicybeast.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/legrimpeur_HD_cropped.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：100px；" />;<br />;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles -at-once-and-failing-financially-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387030" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;草图。系统</stitle>; <id>;https://sketch.systems</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T05:45:31.391521Z</updated>; <link href="https://sketch.systems"/ >; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Sketch.systems 是一种基于 David Harel 在 1980 年代开发的状态图形式主义的绘图工具。它允许用户通过单击图表来浏览系统草图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sketch-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36378731" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;编写自由软件</stitle>; <id>;https://writefreesoftware.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T11:45:31.391873Z</updated>; <link href="https ://writefreesoftware.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;stargrave</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stargrave</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;自由软件是一项全球协作运动，旨在以尊重用户和作者的基本权利和自由的方式构建世界上最好的软件——自由使用、研究、改进和共享您的软件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#write-free-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36389763" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;问 HN：为什么要用 Discord 而不是公共论坛？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36390647</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -19T13:45:31.392225Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36390647"/>; <author>; <name>;lnalx</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lnalx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;随着 Reddit 的停电，我看到很多社区将他们的成员重定向到他们的 Discord。但 Discord 远不是一个真正的知识库，它是压倒性的，信息无法通过搜索引擎搜索到。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-why-discord-instead-of-a-public-forum" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36390647" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不同Lemmy实例的比较</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T06:45:31.392574Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances/main/lemmy-migration-find-subreddits-communities.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;不同Lemmy实例的比较。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户为 maltfield/awesome-lemmy-instances 开发做出贡献。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#comparison-of-different-lemmy-instances" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36387939" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;在 FPGA 上构建网络键值存储</stitle>; <id>;https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T05:45:31.392935Z</更新>; <link href="https://adamwalker.github.io/Building-FPGA-KVS/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://adamwalker.github.io/ images/arty.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于在功能性硬件描述语言 Clash 中构建基于 FPGA 的网络键值存储。它描述了 FPGA 定制的哈希表设计、测试框架及其性能和资源使用情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-networked-key-value-store-on-an-fpga" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387477" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;泰坦尼克号旅游潜艇失踪引发搜索</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada -65953872</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T14:45:31.393282Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-us-canada-65953872"/>; <author>; <name>;lode</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lode</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/976/cpsprodpb/143A6/production/_130145828_6dccae7f9b453bcc567d7f17f7a1f949444c68a00_108_1200_6751000x563.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：1 24px;" />;<br />;为什么纽约的摩天大楼导致它下沉。视频为什么纽约的摩天大楼导致它下沉 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#titanic-tourist-sub-goes-missing-sparking-search" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36391053" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;KDE Plasma 6 已经达到“相当宜居”的地步</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.phoronix.com/news/KDE-Plasma-6-Fairly-Livable</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T14:45:31.393634Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .phoronix.com/news/KDE-Plasma-6-Fairly-Livable"/>; <author>; <name>;thepbone</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thepbone</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/kde.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;KDE 开发人员 Nate Graham 认为 Plasma 6 现在“相当适合”，并建议 KDE 开发人员和高级用户开始尝试。他还提到 Plasma 6 足够稳定，他可以在旅行中使用它。 Nate 认为 Plasma 6.0 可能会在 12 月到 3 月之间发布。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kde-plasma-6-has-reached-the-point-of-being-fairly-livable" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36391492" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MusicGen-Looper：从文本提示生成固定 bpm 循环</stitle>; <id>;https://replicate.com/ andreasjansson/musicgen-looper</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T09:45:31.393980Z</updated>; <link href="https://replicate.com/andreasjansson/musicgen-looper"/>; <作者>; <name>;法格胡特</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fagerhult</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /og.replicate.com/api/models/andreasjansson/musicgen-looper" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;一段音乐是通过MusicGen运行提示符生成的，然后BeatNet检测节拍和强拍。变奏是通过使用 MusicGen 的延续功能创建的，并且所有变奏都经过时间拉伸以精确匹配请求的速度。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#musicgen-looper-generate-fixed-bpm-loops-from-text-prompts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388919" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Canva 如何节省 Amazon S3 成本</stitle>; <id>;https://www.canva.dev/blog/engineering/optimising-s3-储蓄/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T07:45:31.394324Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.canva.dev/blog/engineering/optimising-s3-savings/"/ >; <author>; <name>;kenaqshal</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kenaqshal</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= "https://www.canva.dev/_next/static/media/thumbnail.364a86da.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Canva 是一款运行在 AWS 上的在线设计工具，月活跃用户超过 1 亿。他们在 Amazon S3 中存储了超过 230 PB 的数据，并且通过将不常访问的数据转移到 S3 Glacier Instant Retrieval 每年节省了数百万美元。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-canva-saves-amazon-s3-costs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388178" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;摩托车手隐形训练 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x94PGgYKHQ0</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-19T07:45:31.394670Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x94PGgYKHQ0"/>; <author>; <name>;dsego</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dsego</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/x94PGgYKHQ0" frameborder= "0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#invisibility-training-for-motorcyclists-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36375118" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GCC Lands AVX-512 Fully-Masked Vectorization</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phoronix.com /news/GCC-AVX-512-Fully-Masked-Vector</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T13:45:31.395033Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.phoronix.com/ news/GCC-AVX-512-Fully-Masked-Vector"/>; <author>; <name>;pella</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pella</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/gnu.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;SUSE 工程师已经为 GCC 14 开发代码实现了 AVX-512 全屏蔽矢量化支持。这种支持提高了 x264 测试用例和其他未完全矢量化的用例的性能。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gcc-lands-avx-512-fully-masked-vectorization" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36390884" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Twitter 律师不堪重负，因为下岗员工提出仲裁要求</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techdirt.com/2023/06/16/twitters-lawyers -admit-theyre-overwhelmed-as-nearly-2000-laid-off-employees-file-arbitration-claims/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T12:45:31.395394Z</updated>; <link href= “https://www.techdirt.com/2023/06/16/twitters-lawyers-admit-theyre-overwhelmed-as-nearly-2000-laid-off-employees-file-arbitration-claims/”/>; <作者>; <name>;isaacfrond</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=isaacfrond</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //www.techdirt.com/wp-content/themes/techdirt/assets/images/footer-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;多年来，大企业利用强制仲裁协议的优势，阻止某些诉讼并确保有利的结果。然而，近年来，人们通过向公司大量提出仲裁请求进行反击。最近解雇了数千名员工的 Twitter 现在正面临大量仲裁索赔，其律师不堪重负。他们正在请求协调的发现计划，以有效处理数千起案件。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#twitter-lawyers-overwhelmed-as-laid-off-employees-file-arbitration-claims" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36390308" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;WingetUI – 更好的包管理器 UI</stitle>; <id>;http://www.marticliment.com/wingetui/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T09 :45:31.395745Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.marticliment.com/wingetui/"/>; <author>; <name>;t0bia_s</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=t0bia_s</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marticliment/WingetUI/main/wingetui/resources/icon .png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;WingetUI 是 Windows 包管理器的图形用户界面，允许用户轻松安装、更新和卸载软件。它支持流行的包管理器，如 Winget、Scoop、Chocolatey、Pip 和 NPM ，并提供备份和恢复、批量安装和卸载以及自动软件更新等附加功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#wingetui-a-better-ui-for-your-package -managers" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36373976" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPU 编程：何时、为何以及如何？</stitle >; <id>;https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T00:45:31.396435Z</updated>; <link href="https://enccs. github.io/gpu-programming/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/_static/ENCCS.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 236px;" />;<br />;图形处理单元 (GPU) 是全球许多高性能计算 (HPC) 系统的主力。Top500 中启用 GPU 的超级计算机的数量近年来一直在稳步增长并且这种发展有望继续。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpu-programming-when-why-and-how" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何使用 50M Toffoli 门计算 256 位椭圆曲线密钥</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs /2306.08585</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T04:45:31.396777Z</更新>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2306.08585"/>; <作者>; <名称>;aburan28< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aburan28</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv. org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 129px;" />;<br />;我们使用 Shor 算法计算椭圆曲线私钥，作为硅光子学启发的活动体积架构中资源估计的案例研究。非本地连接降低了每次成本与 2D 局部架构相比，键值提高了 300-700 倍。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-compute-a-256-bit-elliptic-curve-key-with -50m-toffoli-gates" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36387371" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;合并磁共振和光片显微镜整个小鼠大脑</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.2218617120</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T06:45:31.397123Z</updated>; < link href="https://www.pnas.org/doi/10.1073/pnas.2218617120"/>; <author>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#merged-magnetic-resonance-and-light-sheet-microscopy-of -the-whole-mouse-brain" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36379376" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;里面有多少沉船世界的海洋？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans</id>; <updated >;2023-06-19T00:45:31.397473Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the- worlds-oceans"/>; <author>; <name>;Thevet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Thevet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://ychef.files.bbci.co.uk/976x549/p0ft978s.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本周联合国教科文组织宣布发现三艘新沉船，其中两艘已有数千年历史。根据联合国教科文组织的分析，世界海洋中有超过三百万艘未被发现的沉船。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-world-s-oceans" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36374370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Apple 在一场怪异的商标战中与苹果较量</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wired.com/story/ apple-vs-apples-trademark-battle/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T13:45:31.397811Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wired.com/story/apple- vs-apples-trademark-battle/"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.wired.com/photos/648ccd0b57ff6ec62db8a7dc/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/whiteapple_redbackground_biz_GettyImages-740523449.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;瑞士最古老、最大的果农组织瑞士水果联盟可能不得不更改其标志，因为苹果正试图获得对苹果描绘的知识产权。苹果已经制作了类似的向世界各地的知识产权机构提出请求，并取得了不同程度的成功。该案例凸显了蓬勃发展的全球知识产权行业的动态，在该行业中，公司为他们并不真正需要的商标疯狂竞争。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#apple-is-taking-on-apples-in-a-weird-trademark-battle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36390600" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
